Hawke’s Bay Regional Council sets aside pool of $1m to give to more than 1000 residents — if they ask for it https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-regional-council-sets-aside-pool-of-1m-to-give-to-more-than-1000-居民，如果他们要求的话/GVEXFSCQHRA3HPJ2YBWW6CVXRY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-regional-council-sets-aside-pool-of-1m-to-give-to-more-than-1000-居民，如果他们要求的话/GVEXFSCQHRA3HPJ2YBWW6CVXRY/ James PocockNeil Kirton said he would advocate for council to send letters to all affected ratepayers. Photo / Warren Buckland
